definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: This paper introduce the formation and characteristics of Naxizu costumes and adornments .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了麗江地區納西族民俗服飾的形成及其特點。

sentences.english: Lijiang Prefecture is the oldest travel agencies.
sentences.chinese: 是麗江地區成立最早的旅行社。

sentences.english: The active structures are developed in Lijiang area and tectonic earthquakes then are happened frequently.
sentences.chinese: 麗江地區活動性構造發育，地震發生頻繁。

sentences.english: Lijiang Prefecture is the major developing tourist area of Yunnan Province.
sentences.chinese: 麗江地區是雲南省發展最快的旅遊區。
